flip_chart-centered-content.flip_chart-teacher-facing-paragraph: Five little froggies jumping on the bed. One fell down and bumped its head. Mama called the doctor and the doctor said, “No more froggies jumping on the bed.”

No little froggies jumping on the bed. “What did you learn?” their mama said. Each little froggy rubbed its head. Then they all agreed as their mama said, “No more froggies jumping on the bed!”
